means: 盗用公款者，侵占公款犯

sentence.Network_en: The embezzler was severely punished and enjoined to kick back a portion of the stolen money each month.
sentence.Network_cn: 贪污犯受到了严厉惩罚,并被责令每月退还部分赃款.

sentence.Network_en: Soon after the loss was discovered a warrant was sworn out for the embezzler's arrest.
sentence.Network_cn: 一发现亏损,就立即提出指控而获得了逮捕令逮捕那用公款的人.

sentence.Network_en: The district attorney a good suit against the embezzler.
sentence.Network_cn: 区检察长对盗用公款者提出起诉.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who violates a trust by taking (money) for their own use
